body:
#### PR description:

Add new workflows for run3 2023 and 2024 scenarios. This PR should be merged with the AlCa PR at the same time: https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/compare/CMSSW_11_0_X...christopheralanwest:alca-gt-2023-2024?expand=1

#### PR validation:

Local validation done
title: add workflows for 2023 and 2024 scenarios
